title: License for group child care home, group child care
context: B. Group Child Care Home and Group Child Care Center Licensure Note Source notes for §§346-161 to 346-166 do not include reference to L 1988, c 125, §3, which purports to amend these sections with identical amendments made by L 1987, c 339, §4. §346-161 License for group child care home, group child care center required. No person shall operate, maintain, or conduct a group child care home or group child care center unless licensed to do so by the department of human services under this subpart. [L 1985, c 208, pt of §2; am L 1987, c 339, §4]
